title: Bobby Talks Dating & Wanting Kids + Amy Shares When She Knew Her Husband Was 'The One'
itunes:title: Bobby Talks Dating & Wanting Kids + Amy Shares When She Knew Her Husband Was 'The One'
description:
Bobby asks for advice on who he should be dating since he would like to have children. Amy shares when she knew her husband was "the one." Also, Joy Williams stops by the studio.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
